Title: Relates to former patients interred at present and former state mental health hospital cemeteries
Summary: Provides for the availability of certain records of former patients interred at state mental health hospital cemeteries.
LawCode: Add ยง33.26, amd ยง33.16, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to former patients interred at present and former state mental health hospital cemeteries
